page.title: 01THE BLOCK 04400333
page.content: THE BLOCK 04400333 contains part of{ {SPONDON}a suburb of {DERBY, }part of { {OCKBROOK}an expanding village, part of the village of {DRAYCOTT}and all of the village of {BORROWASH}which lies within the parish of {OCKBROOK.}This block also contains part of the { {COURTAULDS ACETATE}complex where until recently a large percentage of local people have been employed.It also contains a large section of the { {ELVASTON CASTLE COUNTRY PARK}but not ELVASTON CASTLE itself.The block contains areas of high population density and areas devoted to crop production.It is an area of contrasts containing neither city nor totally self-contained village.It is crossed, or divided, by main roads particularly the {A.52},a railway line and the relics of the disused {DERBY CANAL.}
